tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GenderDiscriminationComplaints (
  complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complainant_name VARCHAR(255),
  complainant_gender VARCHAR(10),
  accused_name VARCHAR(255),
  accused_gender VARCHAR(10),
  complaint_date DATE,
  investigation_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complainant_name VARCHAR(255),
    complaint_date DATE,
    complaint_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
    investigation_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_complaint_id FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES complaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE complaints (
   complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   complainant_name VARCHAR(255),
   gender VARCHAR(10),
   complaint_date DATE,
   description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigations (
   investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   complaint_id INT,
   investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE enforcement (
   enforcement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   investigation_id INT,
   enforcement_agency VARCHAR(255),
   fine_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
   status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complainant_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE complaints_assignment (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    investigator_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DiscriminationComplaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complainant_name VARCHAR(50),
    complaint_date DATE,
    complaint_description TEXT,
    investigation_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE InvestigationDetails (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    investigation_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    resolution_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplaintCategories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Investigators (
    investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplaintEvidence (
    evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
    evidence_details TEXT,
    validity_status VARCHAR(20)
)
